articles.author: Jessica Hamzelou
articles.title: Can an N95 face mask protect you from catching the new coronavirus?
articles.description: Face masks are reportedly selling out across China, as people try to protect themselves from the new coronavirus. But in some cases, it may be dangerous to wear certain masks
articles.content:
By Jessica Hamzelou
A man wears a mask near Wuhan, China
Stringer/Getty
Face masks are reportedly selling out in cities across Asia as concerns over the spread of a deadly new coronavirus grow. Chinas National Health Commission has deployed masks to health… [+3015 chars]

articles.author: Jessica Hamzelou
articles.title: New coronavirus may be much more contagious than initially thought
articles.description: The new coronavirus is spreading faster than SARS - and it may be because it can be passed on before a person shows any sign of symptoms
articles.content:
By Jessica Hamzelou
The new virus belongs to the coronavirus family
ALFRED PASIEKA/SCIENCE PHOTO LIBRARY
A deadly new coronavirus has now reached at least 14 countries. As of Monday 27 January, there are 2,794 confirmed cases of the virus, while tens of th… [+6203 chars]
